Title: The True Owner of the Great Sword
Actors: Kappei Yamaguchi, Satsuki Yukino, Kumiko Watanabe
Plot: Inuyasha and Sesshomaru continue fighting for the Tetsusaiga. After the fight, while Sesshomaru is recovering, a little orphan girl, Rin, tries to bring him food. When her village is attacked by wolf demons, Sesshomaru returns the...
